articles.title: Deep Strikes Into Russia: M-Code Satellite Guidance To Fire ATACMS, Storm Shadow Makes U.S. Complicit - EurAsian Times
articles.description: At their meeting in Washington, D.C., on September 13, 2024, British Prime Minister Keir Starmer and U.S. President Joe Biden reportedly discussed whether to allow Kyiv to use long-range missiles against Russia.  In light of President Volodymyr Zelensky’s ear…
